[Home](./index.md) &gt; [react-native-render-html-table-bridge](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.md) &gt; [TableConfig](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.md)

## TableConfig interface

This object defines how the table component can be customized.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TableConfig<WebViewProps = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoheight](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.autoheight.md) | boolean | Fit height to HTML content. |
|  [cssRules](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.cssrules.md) | string | Override default CSS rules with this prop. |
|  [defaultHeight](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.defaultheight.md) | number | If <code>autoheight</code> is set to <code>true</code>, <code>defaultHeight</code> will be ignored. Otherwise, container height will be fixed to <code>defaultHeight</code>. |
|  [maxHeight](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.maxheight.md) | number | Maximum container height. Content will be scrollable on overflow. |
|  [sourceBaseUrl](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.sourcebaseurl.md) | string | See https://git.io/JeCAG |
|  [style](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.style.md) | StyleProp&lt;ViewStyle&gt; | Container style. |
|  [tableStyleSpecs](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.tablestylespecs.md) | [TableStyleSpecs](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tablestylespecs.md) | Specs to generate css rules. |
|  [transitionDuration](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.transitionduration.md) | number | The transition duration in milliseconds when table height is updated when <code>autoheight</code> is used. |
|  [useLayoutAnimations](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.uselayoutanimations.md) | boolean | Use native <code>LayoutAnimation</code> instead of <code>Animated</code> module with <code>autoheight</code>. |
|  [WebViewComponent](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.webviewcomponent.md) | ComponentType&lt;WebViewProps&gt; | The <code>WebView</code> Component you wish to use. |
|  [webViewProps](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.webviewprops.md) | WebViewProps | Any props you'd like to pass to [TableConfig.WebViewComponent](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.tableconfig.webviewcomponent.md)<!-- -->. |
